participant_1.name: Lena
participant_1.personality: adventurous and enthusiastic, always looking for new experiences.
participant_1.background: i am not a good swimmer at all. i love rollercoasters and sky diving. hello i just moved here from germany. i am a vegan and i love hummus.

participant_2.name: Margaret
participant_2.personality: caring and resilient, finding joy in family life and creative pursuits.
participant_2.background: i can sew my own clothes. i had cancer but its gone now. i'm retired and living the great life. i have amazing children and grandchildren.

content.text: yes i have amazing children and grandchildren. what skills do you have?
i have two kids and a son .
i can sew my own clothes but can't count my scraps. what do you do for living?
i am a stay at home mom .
i had cancer but its gone now. have you seen it?
no , i am a stay at home mom .
sorry about that. i'm retired and living the great life and i think you wish you were too
i do , i do not know how to make a living , i am a nurse
